tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Database 19c and the workshop.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Get an Oracle Cloud Free Tier account and sign in.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Generate SSH Keys - Cloud Shell
tutorials.description: Steps to generate SSH keys using Cloud Shell.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Install Oracle Database 19c with Automatic Root Script Execution
tutorials.description: Install Oracle Database 19c with automatic configuration script execution. You access a Gaucamole desktop on your compute instance from a browser.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Deploy an Oracle Database 19c Image
tutorials.description: Deploy a compute instance running Oracle Database 19c by using Resource Manager

tutorials.title: Appendix A: Install Oracle Database 19c with Automatic Root Script Execution - X11 Forwarding
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to install the Oracle Database 19c with automatic configuration script execution. You run the Oracle Database installer by using X11 forwarding.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
